alert.note: Alert for Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 1:01PM CST until January 01 at 1:45PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Tishomingo County in northeastern Mississippi... East central Prentiss County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 145 PM CST. * At 101 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Burton, or near Tishomingo State Park, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tishomingo State Park, Tishomingo, Burton, Paden, Mingo, Dennis, Bloody Springs, Petertown, Neil and Carter Branch. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
